Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a home run in the 10th inning to tie the game

The Yankees bullpen held the Guardians off the scoreboard
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees made a serious decision to empty out a huge chunk of their pitching depth last December
Juan Soto had an all-world track record but didn't have the best 2023 in San Diego
The Yankees will wait to see how the National League shakes out to determine their opponent in the Fall Classic
Post-Match Reflections: Juan Soto hit a home run that may be bigger than the one he hit in the 2019 World Series
The Yankee bullpen held the Guardians off the scoreboard, bending but not breaking
